ygData.subject: RE: er
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm, if this is true I think the word I m looking for is disappointed. Oh well, since it doesn t look like I m going to bother with the BP quest (maybe some of
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm, if this is true I think the word I'm looking for is disappointed.
Oh well, since it doesn't look like I'm going to bother with the BP quest
(maybe some of the others though depending on stats) I would like to know
has anybody got the Chest Plate of the Dark Flame here, and if so how hard
of a camp is it? Is the Chest Plate the Rare or Common?

It's about time I upgraded my Charred BP and it's between this and the DE
BP, but being a Dark Elf I would like the added str the Dark Flame gives..
So much for my MM faction..

Oh on a side note, I stopped by Cazic over the weekend and it actually had
more people then it used to (Lots of people farming Ravenscale, plus the
most SK's I've ever seen in one place). Makes me remember why I swore I'd
never go back there...

Enjoy..




-----Original Message-----
From: Grant Vanderhule [mailto:vandergm@...]
Sent: Saturday, October 16, 1999 10:55 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] er


From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>

strike that. you are telling me the bp has less ac than the RANGER AND ROGUE
TUNICS????
